translation.en: She's stacking three layers of chocolate sponge
translation.es: Apila tres capas de bizcocho de chocolate

translation.en: on top of three layers of lemon, sandwiched with fresh raspberries…
I'm making buttercream roses.
My artistic skills coming out now.
I'd love to get the presentation right. Probably the opposite of Kim- Joy.
translation.es: Me gusta la buena presentación. Seguramente soy lo opuesto a Kim-Joy.

translation.en: Yeah, I think I like the decorating. It's probably my favorite part…
translation.es: Sí, me gusta decorar. Creo que es mi parte favorita.

translation.en: - Come on, kids. - You can do this, Rahul.
I don't think that's gonna stay. It's literally caved in at the back.
translation.es: Se derrumbará. Está hundido en la parte de atrás.

translation.en: Bakers, you--
…stay. It's literally caved in at the back.
Bakers, you only have one minute left.
translation.es: Pasteleros, solo les queda un minuto.

translation.en: - Okay, do you need help? -  It's okay. You've got this.
I think I've done Del Boy proud. He'd try and sell it for a couple quid.
translation.es: Del Boy estará orgulloso. Intentaría venderlo, ¿no creen?

translation.en: Look at the state of it. What an absolute state.
translation.es: Miren lo que es. Un desastre total.

translation.en: It looks terrible. Melting and breaking from everywhere.
translation.es: Horrible. Se desmorona por todas partes.

translation.en: There it is. It's done.
That's it, guys. I'm so wounded.
I'm sorry, bakers, but your time is up.
translation.es: Lo siento, pasteleros, pero se les acabó el tiempo.

translation.en: That is the end of all of your vegan challenges. Well done.
translation.es: Ese fue el último de los retos veganos. Bien hecho.

translation.en: - Oh God. No. - I think your cake's just fallen.
translation.es: Dios mío. No. Creo que colapsó el pastel.

translation.en: No, no, no, no!
When was the last time you killed someone?
Couple weeks ago.
Are you serious? Who did you kill?
Some guy who was causing trouble at the docks.
translation.es: Un tipo que estaba dando problemas en los muelles.

translation.en: I usually don't take the time to ask their names. Why?
translation.es: No les pregunto el nombre. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: I've been in this game almost 30 years. Fuck.
translation.es: Llevo casi 30 años en esto. Mierda.

translation.en: I used to be the guy they called when things got real.
translation.es: Antes me llamaban cuando había problemas.

translation.en: Now I'm only brought in to clean up someone else's mess.
translation.es: Ahora me usan para arreglar el desastre de otros.

translation.en: We do what we're told.
Maybe they're trying to keep you out of trouble.
Like a sign of respect.
My nickname is Blood Boots.
Shouldn't I get them bloody every once in a while?
Hey, bro, this is what happens when you give yourself a nickname.
translation.es: Bueno, eso es lo que pasa cuando te pones un apodo.

translation.en: It creates too many expectations.
There's blood on your boots now.
translation.es: Mira, ahora tienes sangre en las botas.

translation.en: Shut up.
Hurry up. Less talking, more disposing of bodies.
translation.es: Apúrense. Menos charla. Más deshacerse de los cuerpos. Tengo vecinos.

translation.en: I have neighbors.
translation.es: Más deshacerse de los cuerpos. Tengo vecinos.

translation.en: Damn, did you burn something?
Dad.
Isn't he supposed to be in hiding?
He was worried about you.
Did you burn something?
Why only three?
They know you,
know what you can do.
Why only send three?
And why here?
Better to attack when you get out of your car,
translation.es: Sería mejor atacarte cuando sales del auto,

translation.en: where there's room for them to escape if it goes wrong.
translation.es: donde pueden escaparse si algo sale mal.

translation.en: Or…
when you get out of the elevator.
Tight quarters in the hallway removes your advantage.
translation.es: El espacio reducido del pasillo les da ventaja.

translation.en: Maybe they're bad at their jobs.
You should have kept one alive to question.
You enjoy killing too much.
I'm sure Sleepy Chan sent them.
Probably payback for the dumbass Xing killed on the docks.
translation.es: Como venganza porque Xing fue asesinado.

translation.en: Always consider the most complicated possibility,
translation.es: Siempre considera la posibilidad más complicada,

translation.en: then work your way back to the most obvious answer.
translation.es: luego regresa a la respuesta más obvia.

translation.en: Then you will never be surprised.
Yes.
What's wrong?
- Move! - Cover us!
- Cover us! - Go get the car!
Make the windows bulletproof
translation.es: Pon ventanas a prueba de balas

translation.en: and put a steel bomb- shield under the chassis.
translation.es: y un escudo de acero bajo el chasis.

translation.en: Hurry!
Any word from the hospital?
We should switch to English.
We don't know who we can trust.
He's out of surgery. In a coma.
translation.es: Salió de la cirugía en coma.

translation.en: There was a lack of blood flow to the brain, so we don't know if he will wake up.
translation.es: Se cortó el flujo de sangre al cerebro. No sabemos si despertará.

translation.en: I want Sleepy Chan, and his vain prick son Drowsy, alive.
translation.es: A Dormilón Chan y al idiota de su hijo, Perezoso, los quiero vivos.

translation.en: No one gets to kill them but me.
Okay, but--
They used me as bait to draw my father out of hiding.
translation.es: Me usaron como carnada para llegar a mi padre.

translation.en: Sleepy Chan is tired of being head of the second most powerful Triad family.
translation.es: Dormilón Chan ya no quiere ser jefe de la segunda familia más poderosa.

translation.en: He wants to take our place, maybe even declare himself Dragon Head.
translation.es: Quiere nuestro lugar, incluso declararse Cabeza de Dragón.

translation.en: But we don't know if Sleepy Chan is behind this.
translation.es: No sabemos si él está detrás de esto.

translation.en: No one could ID the attackers. These are fresh faces.
translation.es: Nadie pudo identificar a los atacantes. Son caras nuevas.

translation.en: Some new gang with the balls and brains to find me
translation.es: ¿Una nueva pandilla con las agallas y la inteligencia

translation.en: and organize a sophisticated attack like that?
translation.es: para organizar un ataque como ese?

translation.en: No way.
Your father would tell you to be cautious.
translation.es: Tu padre te pediría que seas cauteloso.

translation.en: Not to jump to conclusions.
If this wasn't Sleepy Chan,
you could start a full- out war for no reason.
translation.es: empezarás una guerra en vano, sin razón.

translation.en: Don't be headstrong, huh?
My father noticed something about the body before he was shot. Any idea what it was?
translation.es: Mi padre notó algo en un cuerpo antes del disparo. ¿Sabes qué era?

translation.en: No, but I did hear what he said to you after he was shot.
translation.es: No, pero escuché lo que te dijo después del disparo.

translation.en: Your mother's name.
What has your father always taught you? Huh?
Protect the family.
If anything ever happened to him, to go look after my mother. No hesitation.
translation.es: Y que si alguna vez le pasaba algo, que busque a mi madre. Sin dudarlo.

translation.en: Your mother must be protected at all costs.
translation.es: Tu madre debe ser protegida como sea.

translation.en: She is the key to our power.
translation.es: Ella es la clave de nuestro poder.

translation.en: Look, she left because it was her duty to go.
translation.es: Mira, ella se fue porque era su deber, para…

translation.en: - To-- - Protect the family.
I know.
Your mother and Bruce are alone out there.
translation.es: Tu madre y Bruce están solos.

translation.en: - Do you want me to send someone with you? - No.
I don't wanna draw any attention.
- And I'll have my brother. - I don't think he's gonna be much help.
translation.es: - Y tendré a mi hermano. - No creo que sea de mucha ayuda.

translation.en: He wasn't raised in this life.
translation.es: No fue criado en esta vida.

translation.en: He'll have to learn quickly, then.
He's a Sun.
♪ You know I'm comin' back If you move it like that ♪
- Two, I can make it all about you… ♪ - Damn.
- There. That's our Lyft. - ♪ I can make you go mainstream ♪
- ♪ Never come down… ♪ - Hello, ladies.
- Aah! How's it goin'? You guys have-- -
No, no, no! No! No, no, no!
- When did you have pizza? - ♪ Gimme some, some of that ♪
♪ Somethin' I cannot buy ♪
♪ Phone's been on blast like all day… ♪
Bruce! Wake up!
You're going to be late!
I'm coming.
- Were you out working late last night? - Yep.
Just working?
Yes, Mom. I stopped doing the other thing.
translation.es: Sí, mamá. Dejé de hacer lo otro.

translation.en: I swear.
Oh, chubby cheeks. I'm so proud of you.
translation.es: Ay, Cachetitos. Estoy tan orgullosa de ti.

translation.en: - Text me when you get to school. - Why?
translation.es: - Avísame cuando llegues a la facultad. - ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Because I just told you to.
translation.es: Porque te lo acabo de pedir.

translation.en: Go get smart.
Okay.
- ♪ Here I am dreaming again ♪ - ♪ Dreaming ♪ - ♪ Dreaming ♪ - ♪ Dreaming ♪
- ♪ It always makes me cry… ♪ - There's still 20 minutes left.
Oh, but I'm-- I'm finished.
You turned the last one in early, too, and it cost you points.
translation.es: También te apuraste la última vez y te costó puntos.

translation.en: Bs still get degrees.
I-- I just need a tiny extension to get the money together.
translation.es: Necesito una pequeña extensión para juntar el dinero.

translation.en: Bruce, the only extension I want from you
translation.es: Bruce, la única extensión que quiero

translation.en: is you extending your hand to grab a pen and write me a tuition check.
translation.es: es la de tu mano para tomar un bolígrafo y escribirme un cheque.

translation.en: You have until tomorrow or we'll have no choice but to invalidate the semester.
translation.es: Si no pagas mañana, tendremos que invalidar el semestre.

translation.en: Okay.
Just…
How much education would this buy me?
There's $7 here.
And this bill smells like puke.
translation.es: Y este billete huele a vómito.

translation.en: It's a down payment.
You can't even buy a club sandwich in the cafeteria for $7.
translation.es: Ni siquiera te alcanza para un sándwich de la cafetería.

translation.en: Maybe that's the problem.
Maybe we-- we should all refuse to pay our tuition
translation.es: Quizá todos deberíamos negarnos a pagar la matrícula

translation.en: until the school addresses
the economic injustice of this institution!
translation.es: la injusticia económica de esta institución.

translation.en: Who's with me?
Get out of the way!
- You suck, dude. Move! - Next.
translation.es: Eres lo peor, amigo. Vete. Siguiente.

translation.en: Yo!
- Hands up, bitch! - Fucking bitch!
Dude, I could have shot you.
You have a gun?
No, but if I did, I could have shot you.
translation.es: No, pero si tuviera, podría haberte disparado.

translation.en: - What's up, baby? - What's up?
Yo, you're just in time. I'm about to smoke me a little kush and hang out with my boy Keanu on Cyberpunk.
translation.es: Llegas justo. Estoy por fumar kush y jugar con mi amigo Keanu en Cyberpunk.

translation.en: You, uh, gettin' high on your own supply?
I sell molly and cocaine.
Weed's legal.
Dude, I'm starting to think my thumbs are, like, freakishly fast.
translation.es: Empiezo a creer que mis pulgares son inusualmente rápidos.

translation.en: Like Julio Jones fast, but just my thumbs.
translation.es: Como Julio Jones, pero solo mis pulgares.

translation.en: Alexa, play my jams.
You got it.
Can I, um…
I need a favor.
Anything, bro.
I need to borrow some money.
How long have I known you? Since the fifth grade?
Hell, I practically taught your ass English.
Bro, friends like us? They don't borrow, man.
translation.es: Amigos como nosotros no piden prestado.

translation.en: They give.
So, how much we talkin'?
- Dollars? - It's for school.
- I will pay you back. - Doesn't your mom pay for school?
translation.es: - Te lo devolveré. - ¿Tu mamá no la paga?

translation.en: Yes, but I kind of spent this semester's tuition money on something else.
translation.es: Sí, pero gasté el dinero de la matrícula de este semestre en otra cosa.

translation.en: I thought you stopped with that stuff. You promised your mom.
translation.es: ¿No habías dejado eso? Se lo prometiste a tu mamá.

translation.en: It's the best improv class in LA.
translation.es: Es la mejor clase de improvisación en Los Ángeles.

translation.en: Will Ferrell and Rachel Dratch are alums!
translation.es: ¡Will Ferrell y Rachel Dratch son exalumnos!

translation.en: You spent five grand learning how to play pretend.
translation.es: Te gastaste cinco mil en aprender a fingir.

translation.en: - - It's improv, okay?
It-- it's an art form.
Okay! If you're so proud of it, why not tell your mom you're doing it?
translation.es: Bien. Si estás tan orgulloso, ¿por qué no le dices a tu mamá?

translation.en: 'Cause she thinks it's a waste of time,
and Bruce Sun doesn't have the nuts to be his own man.
translation.es: y Bruce Sun no tiene las agallas para ser independiente.

translation.en: Yo, you think John Cho hides what he does from his mom?
translation.es: ¿Crees que John Cho le oculta lo que hace a su mamá?

translation.en: Plus, my cash is more powder than liquid right now, so, uh…
translation.es: Además, tengo más polvo que dinero ahora.

translation.en: Shit.
Listen, I do have a way you can earn that money.
translation.es: Pero escucha, sé cómo puedes ganar ese dinero.

translation.en: - I'm not selling drugs, TK. - That's not my plan.
translation.es: No venderé drogas, TK. Ese no es mi plan.

translation.en: It's always your plan.
Okay, that's my plan.
It's my night to do handouts at the club, and I could use your help.
translation.es: Hoy trabajaré en la discoteca. Me puedes ayudar.

translation.en: With the two of us, we would clear five G so easy.
translation.es: Entre los dos, sacaríamos 5000 sin problema.

translation.en: Dude, I am not a criminal!
Yeah, and neither am I.
I'm an employee at a company that sells a product.
We have a hierarchy.
We have quotas just like every pharmaceutical company out there!
translation.es: Debemos cubrir una cuota de ventas como cualquier farmacéutica.

translation.en: Well, except if I fuck up, they slit my throat, toss me in a sack in the Rio Hondo.
translation.es: Excepto que si la cago, me degüellan y me tiran al río.

translation.en: Yeah, you're not doing a good job selling this.
translation.es: No lo estás vendiendo muy bien.

translation.en: How's this for a sell?
translation.es: A ver si esto te convence.

translation.en: There's no way you're gonna earn five grand in a year, let alone one night.
translation.es: Es imposible que ganes 5000 en un año, mucho menos en una noche.

translation.en: Aren't you studying to be a doctor?
Dude, all you're gonna do your whole life is sell drugs anyway.
translation.es: Viejo, dedicarás tu vida a vender drogas.

translation.en: I bet you can earn college credit if you work with me tonight.
translation.es: Trabajar conmigo esta noche será como una clase extra.

translation.en: - - If I'm just doing handoffs and collecting money,
translation.es: Si solo hago entregas y recaudo el dinero,

translation.en: it's not technically selling drugs.
I mean, it totally is. It's, like, exactly selling them.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Eso es vender drogas.

translation.en: But who cares?
How about this? Don't even sell the drugs.
translation.es: Mira, ni siquiera vendas las drogas.

translation.en: Just act like a dude who's selling the drugs.
translation.es: Solo actúa como un tipo que vende drogas.

translation.en: I mean, ah, it-- it would be a good acting exercise.
translation.es: Bueno… sería un buen ejercicio de actuación.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Now we're talkin'.
Okay.
Okay.
- Yeah. - Mm- hmm?
- Let's do it. - That's my boy right there.
Choosin' life just like Wham!
Hello and welcome to Los Angeles.
The current temperature is 72 degrees Fahrenheit.
Please do not forget to check the seat- back pocket for smaller items.
translation.es: No olvide revisar si queda algo en el bolsillo del asiento.

translation.en: Checked luggage can be found at carousel seven.
translation.es: El equipaje saldrá por la cinta siete.

translation.en: Thank you for flying with us, and please enjoy your stay in sunny Los Angeles.
translation.es: Gracias, y disfrute su estadía en la soleada Los Ángeles.

translation.en: Who sent you?
Sleepy Chan?
Riddance of evil… must be thorough.
translation.es: El mal debe ser eliminado por completo.

translation.en: - - Bruce.
Charles?
Who's this?
I don't know.
I brought pastries.
Your beard looks terrible.
Look what you did to the house!
translation.es: ¡Mira lo que le hiciste a la casa!

translation.en: He did most of this.
Did you even try to clean up?
Do you not clean up after yourself at home?
translation.es: ¿No limpias lo que ensucias en tu casa?

translation.en: I usually smoke and wait for people to come clean up.
translation.es: Suelo esperar a que vengan a limpiar.

translation.en: There are no people here.
Just us.
Little Fatty.
My handsome little boy.
Have you eaten? Come on, I'll make you beef noodles.
Fetch the good knife.
Have you gotten married yet?
They shot Dad.
He's in a coma.
Will he live?
They don't know.
He's strong.
A boy from the country doesn't get to where he got if he's not strong.
translation.es: Un chico de campo no llega a donde llegó él si no es fuerte.

translation.en: I saw that in him before anyone else did.
translation.es: Noté eso en él antes que nadie.

translation.en: It was Sleepy Chan.
Those two have been fighting to be the big fish for 20 years.
translation.es: Desde hace 20 años que esos dos luchan por ser el pez más gordo.

translation.en: But we can't jump to conclusions.
There is always more than what first appears.
translation.es: Nada nunca es lo que parece.

translation.en: Maybe it's time we cash in the insurance policy.
translation.es: Quizá sea hora de cobrar el seguro.

translation.en: I decide when and if we do that.
translation.es: Yo decidiré cuándo y si lo hacemos.

translation.en: With all due respect,
you washed your hands in the golden bowl a long time ago.
translation.es: tú dejaste esta vida hace mucho tiempo.

translation.en: With Big Sun the way he is, anyway, I'm in charge.
translation.es: Con Big Sun en coma, yo estoy a cargo.

translation.en: Who taught you to chop? TV?
- - Go start cleaning up.
Is this him?
He looks soft.
Not soft.
Sensitive.
Same thing.
He wanted to be an actor.
One of those who makes stuff up as he goes?
translation.es: Uno de esos que inventa sobre la marcha.

translation.en: - Improv? - Yeah, I put a stop to that.
Does he know about me and Dad? About where he comes from?
translation.es: ¿Sabe de papá y de mí? ¿De dónde viene?

translation.en: He thinks his father is a gambler
translation.es: Cree que su padre es apostador

translation.en: and, uh, you are in Antarctica working with penguins.
translation.es: y que tú estás en la Antártida trabajando con pingüinos.

translation.en: Fuck.
Is he stupid?
Bruce and I kept hidden from the world by being boring.
translation.es: Bruce y yo nos mantuvimos ocultos siendo aburridos.

translation.en: I kept you hidden from him by being exciting.
translation.es: A ti te hice emocionante para mantenerte alejado de él.

translation.en: Both work.
I need to find local muscle to help me look after you.
translation.es: Necesito gente que me ayude a protegerte.

translation.en: Yuan told me about a club where I can find some guys.
translation.es: Yuan dijo que busque en una discoteca.

translation.en: I thought my brother would be able to have my back, but…
translation.es: Pensé que mi hermano me ayudaría, pero no, a menos que Dormilón quiera jugar a actuar.

translation.en: appears he's useless unless Sleepy wants to play charades.
translation.es: pero no, a menos que Dormilón quiera jugar a actuar.

translation.en: We have to stay hidden for as long as possible.
translation.es: Debemos permanecer ocultos lo más posible.

translation.en: Whoever's behind this followed you here from Taipei,
translation.es: Quien esté detrás de esto te siguió desde Taipéi,

translation.en: but you were too arrogant to notice.
translation.es: pero tu arrogancia no te permitió verlo.

translation.en: Your only responsibility right now is to protect me and Bruce.
translation.es: Tu única responsabilidad ahora es protegernos a mí y a Bruce.

translation.en: Bruce is a grown man. He should be able to look after himself.
translation.es: Bruce es un hombre adulto. Debería poder cuidarse solo.

translation.en: In a few hours, they're gonna realize this one hadn't succeeded.
translation.es: En unas horas, se darán cuenta de que este tipo fracasó.

translation.en: I'll be back before then.
I am not a kid anymore.
I know what I'm doing.
- You're not going to eat? - I'm not hungry.
translation.es: - ¿No vas a comer? - No tengo hambre.

translation.en: Come on, the boss needs to make sure you're cool.
translation.es: La jefa debe ver que está todo bien.

translation.en: But, uh, I'm not cool.
Not that kind of cool.
Cool as in not a cop and won't totally fuck this up.
translation.es: Debe ver que no eres policía y no la cagarás.

translation.en: Wait, wait. I-- I don't think I can go through with this.
translation.es: Espera, no creo que pueda seguir con esto.

translation.en: It's not a big deal. Come on.
Yes, it is.
My mom is, like, super cheap,
so the Wi- Fi in our house is terrible,
translation.es: así que el wifi de casa es terrible,

translation.en: but the guy next door has, like, mega 5G with boosters and everything.
translation.es: pero el vecino tiene 5G, con repetidores de señal y todo.

translation.en: Okay, so?
Two years ago, I figured out his password.
translation.es: Hace dos años, descubrí su contraseña.

translation.en: It was his home address.
translation.es: Era la dirección de su casa,

translation.en: But I never logged onto his network.
translation.es: pero nunca me conecté a su red.

translation.en: Do you understand?
Yeah. You're an idiot.
No!
I-- I'm an honest person.
Okay? I don't steal or hurt people.
translation.es: No robo ni lastimo a la gente.

translation.en: Selling drugs isn't technically either.
translation.es: Vender drogas no es eso técnicamente,

translation.en: - But it feels like it's the same family. - Look, Bruce, I know you.
translation.es: pero es de la misma familia. Bruce, te conozco. Sé lo que quieres de la vida.

translation.en: I know what you want out of life.
translation.es: Bruce, te conozco. Sé lo que quieres de la vida.

translation.en: You want that million- dollar car,
hot girls goin' wild,
and the envy and adoration of every guy from here to Hong Kong.
translation.es: y la envidia y adoración de los tipos de aquí a Hong Kong.

translation.en: I guess. I mostly just don't wanna be the biggest loser in the room anymore.
translation.es: Supongo. Más que nada, no quiero ser un fracasado patético.

translation.en: Exactly.
You want respect. You wanna be the man.
translation.es: Quieres respeto. Quieres ser el jefe.

translation.en: Look at me. I'm basically a moron.
translation.es: Mírame a mí. Básicamente, soy un idiota.

translation.en: I know people, and I know how this world works.
translation.es: Conozco gente y sé cómo funciona este mundo.

translation.en: If you wanna be a man and not a little boy,
translation.es: Si quieres ser un hombre y no un niño,

translation.en: you've gotta be willing to make bad choices now and then.
translation.es: debes tomar malas decisiones de vez en cuando.

translation.en: What do you say?
Uh, hello, sir. Nice to meet you. Uh, I'm Bruce.
translation.es: Hola, señor. Mucho gusto. Soy Bruce.

translation.en: Hi!
It is so nice to meet you.
I'm May.
That's Monk. He's from Hong Kong.
translation.es: Él es Monk. Es de Hong Kong.

translation.en: And Jimmy. He just had a baby.
translation.es: Jimmy. Acaba de tener un bebé.

translation.en: And the guy who looks like an orange hipster is Bojing.
translation.es: Y el hípster de naranja es Bojing.

translation.en: Don't get him started on his fantasy football team.
translation.es: No le preguntes sobre su juego de fútbol.

translation.en: And the guy with the scissors is Ernie. He's a wiz with Chinese paper cutting.
translation.es: Y el de las tijeras es Ernie. Es un genio con el corte de papel chino.

translation.en: - - Cool.
TK didn't mention how handsome you are.
translation.es: TK no mencionó lo guapo que eras.

translation.en: Well, that'd be a… weird thing for TK to say.
translation.es: Bueno, sería raro que TK dijera eso.

translation.en: Wouldn't it?
Oh! You're funny too!
Tell me about you, Bruce. What are your hobbies?
Oh, I don't know. Uh…
- Don't say improv. - I play some video games.
- Uh- huh. - Do some… improv.
Oh fuck.
What about you?
- I have a loom in my house. - Like, for weaving?
translation.es: - Tengo un telar en mi casa. - ¡Para tejer!

translation.en: Exactly! Like, I make a little extra money selling stuff on Etsy.
translation.es: ¡Exacto! Gano dinero extra vendiendo cosas en Etsy.

translation.en: - Cool. - And I also like to do this.
translation.es: Genial. Y también me gusta hacer esto.

translation.en: - My real passion is selling drugs. - Hmm.
translation.es: Mi verdadera pasión es vender drogas.

translation.en: Lots of them.
It's my baby.
Selling drugs is your baby?
Yes, Bruce.
And when I hire you to sell them for me, I'm handing you my baby.
translation.es: Y cuando te contrato para que las vendas, te entrego a mi bebé.

translation.en: Do you understand how big a responsibility that is?
How upset I would be if you didn't care for my baby in the right way,
translation.es: ¿Lo enojada que estaría si no cuidaras a mi bebé

translation.en: or, God forbid, hurt it?
translation.es: o, Dios no lo quiera, si lo lastimaras?

translation.en: I think so.
Yes.
Definitely.
Hmm. You're a nice person.
- Thanks. - It wasn't meant as a compliment.
But I trust nice people.
translation.es: Pero confío en la gente buena. Son honestos,

translation.en: They're honest, loyal,
translation.es: Pero confío en la gente buena. Son honestos, leales,

translation.en: too scared to fuck me over.
translation.es: y les da demasiado miedo cagarme.

translation.en: Hooray!
I'm gonna go for a dance. Set him up.
translation.es: Me voy a bailar un rato. Prepárenlo.

translation.en: And remember, have fun!
Bye.
See ya.
Cool jacket.
You did good.
Let's get to work.
- Hey! Here you are. - Oh, right, right. Uh…
Would you like to buy some drugs?
No, I'm not a cop. I-- I am not a cop!
translation.es: No, no soy policía. No soy policía.

translation.en: Yo, how's it going?
Like trying to sell ice cream on a cold day.
translation.es: Es como intentar vender helado un día frío.

translation.en: Product's good. Demand is obviously high. You just gotta have the right attitude.
translation.es: El producto es bueno. La demanda es alta. Depende de tu actitud.

translation.en: Like how?
Act more like a drug dealer and less like a fucking dork.
translation.es: Actúa como un traficante de drogas y no como un idiota.

translation.en: Improv!
Hey!
Come on! Let's dance.
I don't have time for this.
Oh! Uh… you want some snow? You know, some-- some pearl?
translation.es: ¿Quieres de la blanca? Ya sabes, el polvito.

translation.en: Nose candy?
Uh, how about a disco biscuit?
Whoa, hey! Okay, I'm with May! See? I've got the pin!
Oh shit. Are-- are you a cop?
Oh God. Oh no, no, no.
Okay, okay. I-- I haven't sold anything.
I promise. Okay? I tried to, but I'm not any good at it.
translation.es: Lo prometo. Lo intenté, pero soy malísimo.

translation.en: - I-- I will testify against-- - Shut up!
What the hell are you doing here? Mom's gonna kill you.
translation.es: ¿Qué diablos haces aquí? Mamá te matará.

translation.en: Mom?
I'm your brother. Charles.
We're getting out of here now.
- Wait, what? - Is there a problem here?
Yeah.
You're standing in my way.
He's working.
He quits.
- - Oh my God.
Oh my God!
A taser?
My grandmother carries one in her purse.
translation.es: Mi abuela lleva una en su bolso.

translation.en: Taser did just fine taking you out.
Who are you?
I'm, uh, Bruce.
Stop with the bullshit.
You think you can infiltrate my crew?
- Who are you working for? - For you!
I do some driving for Lyft, but we're considered independent contractors--
translation.es: Y conduzco para Lyft, pero somos contratistas independientes…

translation.en: He doesn't know shit.
Oh, and how do you know that?
- Because he's my brother. - That's not true.
translation.es: - Porque es mi hermano. - No es cierto.

translation.en: I've never met this guy before.
We haven't seen each other in a long time. Since he left Taiwan.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no nos vemos. Desde que se fue de Taiwán.

translation.en: We shared a bedroom when we were little with a red carpet and a fake dog.
translation.es: Compartíamos habitación de pequeños. Alfombra roja y un perro falso.

translation.en: Mom wouldn't let us have a real one.
translation.es: Mamá no nos dejaba tener uno.

translation.en: My name is Charles Sun.
Bullshit. How do we know that's true?
translation.es: Mentira. ¿Cómo sé que eso es verdad?

translation.en: Well, I could prove it by killing all of you.
Or you could just check my ID.
Do you have any idea who this guy is?
translation.es: ¿Tienes idea de quién es este tipo?

translation.en: Oh my God! He is a legend.
They call him Chairleg Sun.
His dad is the Red Pole of the Jade Dragons, like, the biggest Triad in Taiwan.
translation.es: Su padre es líder de los Dragones de Jade, la tríada más grande de Taiwán.

translation.en: Super brutal. Super ruthless.
He groomed his son to be his own personal assassin.
translation.es: Preparó a su hijo para que fuera su sicario personal.

translation.en: Sometimes families are really fucked up.
Is it true that you got your numbers
after beating ten assassins to death at Saturday morning dim sum
translation.es: al matar a diez asesinos un sábado por la mañana

translation.en: with only a chair leg?
translation.es: con solo una pata de silla?

translation.en: I killed three men with a rolling pin yesterday.
translation.es: Ayer maté a tres con un palo de amasar.

translation.en: Like I said, a legend!
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Hold--
Dad's rich?
And I'm here driving a Lyft?
We were trying to keep you safe.
Yeah, nice fucking work!
Why are you here?
Are you trying to make a move in LA?
Because we're not interested in foreign interference.
translation.es: No nos interesa la interferencia extranjera.

translation.en: I don't like working for someone else.
translation.es: No me gusta trabajar para otro.

translation.en: I just need a couple of guys to help me for a few days.
translation.es: Solo necesito un par de tipos que me ayuden.

translation.en: - Hmm. With what? - None of your business.
I pay well.
Maybe even enough to hire you.
Bitch, you definitely can't afford me.
translation.es: Mira, dudo mucho que puedas pagar mi precio.

translation.en: Boys,
we're gonna soften up Chairleg a little.
translation.es: vamos a ablandar un poco a Patasilla.

translation.en: If he fights back, shoot his brother in the balls.
translation.es: Si se resiste, dispárenle al hermano en las pelotas.

translation.en: What?
Oh! Oh shit! No!
Why are you stopping?
- I just gotta catch my breath. - We're in the middle of a beating.
translation.es: - Necesito respirar. - Están en medio de una golpiza.

translation.en: They don't usually go on this long.
I'm good to take a break if you guys need one.
translation.es: Si quieren, nos tomamos un descanso.

translation.en: Bruce, do me a favor.
Don't tell Mom. What?
Any last words you wanna say to your brother?
Fuck!
The riddance of evil must be thorough.
translation.es: El mal debe ser eliminado por completo.

translation.en: - Where's Charles Sun? - Spread out! Find Charles Sun!
Where's Charles Sun?
Hey.
Wake up.
We have to go. We have to go.
- - Come on. Come on.
Let's go.
Come on. Let's go.
- - Bruce!
- Who is that? -
My brother.
- Wait! - We can't come in looking like this. Mom is going to freak!
translation.es: ¡Espera! No podemos entrar así. ¡Mamá va a enloquecer!

translation.en: I found Bruce!
- He's safe.  - What the hell?
Mom?
Charles, go get changed. We gotta get rid of the body.
translation.es: Charles, cámbiate. Vamos a deshacernos del cuerpo.

translation.en: Bruce, go to bed. You got a test tomorrow.
translation.es: Bruce, a la cama. Mañana tienes un examen.
